  • yawning_titan.config.environment.game_rules_config.GameRulesConfig

yawning_titan.config.environment.game_rules_config.GameRulesConfig

class yawning_titan.config.environment.game_rules_config.GameRulesConfig(_min_number_of_network_nodes: int, _node_vulnerability_lower_bound: float, _node_vulnerability_upper_bound: float, _max_steps: int, _lose_when_all_nodes_lost: bool, _lose_when_n_percent_of_nodes_lost: bool, _percentage_of_nodes_compromised_equals_loss: float, _lose_when_high_value_node_lost: bool, _lose_when_target_node_lost: bool, _number_of_high_value_nodes: int, _choose_high_value_nodes_placement_at_random: bool, _choose_high_value_nodes_furthest_away_from_entry: bool, _choose_entry_nodes_randomly: bool, _number_of_entry_nodes: int, _prefer_central_nodes_for_entry_nodes: bool, _prefer_edge_nodes_for_entry_nodes: bool, _grace_period_length: int)[source]

Bases: ConfigABC

Class that validates and stores Game Rules Configuration.

Methods

create

Creates an instance of GameRulesConfig after calling .validate.

to_dict

Serializes a ConfigABC as a dict.

validate

Validates the game rules config dict.

Attributes

choose_entry_nodes_randomly

If no entry nodes are supplied choose some at random.

choose_high_value_nodes_furthest_away_from_entry

The node the furthest away from the entry points to the network is picked as the target.

choose_high_value_nodes_placement_at_random

The high value node is picked at random.

grace_period_length

The length of a grace period at the start of the game.

lose_when_all_nodes_lost

The blue agent loses if all the nodes become compromised.

lose_when_high_value_node_lost

Blue loses if a special 'high value' target is lost (a node picked in the environment).

lose_when_n_percent_of_nodes_lost

The blue agent loses if n% of the nodes become compromised.

lose_when_target_node_lost

Blue loses if the target node is lost (a node picked in the environment).

max_steps

The max steps that a game can go on for.

min_number_of_network_nodes

Minimum number of nodes the network this game mode is allowed to run on.

node_vulnerability_lower_bound

A lower vulnerability means that a node is less likely to be compromised.

node_vulnerability_upper_bound

A higher vulnerability means that a node is more vulnerable.

number_of_entry_nodes

If no entry nodes are supplied then how many should be chosen.

number_of_high_value_nodes

If no high value nodes are supplied, how many should be chosen.

percentage_of_nodes_compromised_equals_loss

The percentage of nodes that need to be lost for blue to lose.

prefer_central_nodes_for_entry_nodes

If no entry nodes are supplied then what bias is applied to the nodes when choosing random entry nodes.

prefer_edge_nodes_for_entry_nodes

If no entry nodes are supplied then what bias is applied to the nodes when choosing random entry nodes.
property min_number_of_network_nodes: int

Minimum number of nodes the network this game mode is allowed to run on.

property node_vulnerability_lower_bound: float

A lower vulnerability means that a node is less likely to be compromised.

property node_vulnerability_upper_bound: float

A higher vulnerability means that a node is more vulnerable.

to_dict() → Dict

Serializes a ConfigABC as a dict.

As instances of ConfigABC are dataclasses, the default __dict__ method is used to access the attributes. The private key name of each attribute has its underscore prefix removed before the key and value is added to a dict and returned.

Returns

The ConfigABC as a dict.

property max_steps: int

The max steps that a game can go on for. If the blue agent reaches this they win.

property lose_when_all_nodes_lost: bool

The blue agent loses if all the nodes become compromised.

property lose_when_n_percent_of_nodes_lost: bool

The blue agent loses if n% of the nodes become compromised.

property percentage_of_nodes_compromised_equals_loss: float

The percentage of nodes that need to be lost for blue to lose.

property lose_when_high_value_node_lost: bool

Blue loses if a special ‘high value’ target is lost (a node picked in the environment).

property lose_when_target_node_lost: bool

Blue loses if the target node is lost (a node picked in the environment).

property number_of_high_value_nodes: int

If no high value nodes are supplied, how many should be chosen.

property choose_high_value_nodes_placement_at_random: bool

The high value node is picked at random.

property choose_high_value_nodes_furthest_away_from_entry: bool

The node the furthest away from the entry points to the network is picked as the target.

property choose_entry_nodes_randomly: bool

If no entry nodes are supplied choose some at random.

property number_of_entry_nodes: int

If no entry nodes are supplied then how many should be chosen.

property prefer_central_nodes_for_entry_nodes: bool

If no entry nodes are supplied then what bias is applied to the nodes when choosing random entry nodes.

property prefer_edge_nodes_for_entry_nodes: bool

If no entry nodes are supplied then what bias is applied to the nodes when choosing random entry nodes.

property grace_period_length: int

The length of a grace period at the start of the game.

During this time the red agent cannot act. This gives the blue agent a chance to “prepare” (A length of 0 means that there is no grace period).

classmethod create(config_dict: Dict[str, Any]) → GameRulesConfig[source]

Creates an instance of GameRulesConfig after calling .validate.

Parameters

config_dict – A config dict with the required key/values pairs.

classmethod validate(config_dict: dict)[source]

Validates the game rules config dict.

Param

config_dict: A config dict with the required key/values pairs.
